text:
@realDonaldTrump 1. You are 74, not 4 or 7
2. We have 129,000 dead due to COVID-19
3. Another 40,000 infections today
4. We have 30 million unemployed
5. Protest are ongoing due to police brutality & uneven policing
6. Russia paid bounties for the deaths of soldiers & marines

Address 2 thru 6!
